code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./lesson.css";import{data}from"../../helper/data";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LessonCard=()=>{const[lessonList,setLessonList]=useState(data);const handleClear=()=>{setLessonList([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"title-lesson",children:["Today's ",lessonList.length," Lessons"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"lesson-card",children:lessonList.map(lesson=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lessons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"lesson-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:lesson.image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"lesson-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"lesson-name",children:["Lesson Name: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lesson.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"lesson-hour",children:["Lesson Hour: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:lesson.hour})]})]})]},lesson.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"clear-btn",onClick:handleClear,children:"Clear List"})]});};export default LessonCard;
